SEARCH
Module ui
Package engine.bot.ml_bot.agent

Class QLearningAgent

java.lang.Object
engine.bot.ml_bot.agent.QLearningAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class QLearningAgent extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the Q learning agent. From the time the report was written, a few things changed here to fix the issues we were encountering. The changes will be highlighted with a CHANGED annotation in the Javadocs. The class uses 2-different Neural networks to perform so-called Deep Q Learning, where the separate networks are used for different parts of the learning process. One network is used to solve the Bellman equation, and the other one is used to predict an action based on the current Q Values. !The implementation is still very buggy! Please try it on simple problems (relatively close to the hole)

    • QLearningAgent

      public QLearningAgent(double epsilon, GolfGameEngine golfGameEngine, State initialState, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector holePosition, MapSearcher mapSearcher)
      Class Constructor.
      Parameters:
      epsilon - Decaying value used to select either a random action, or a SoftMax selected action.
      golfGameEngine - The engine used to simulate the game.
      initialState - The initial position / state of the ball.
      holePosition - The position of the hole.
      mapSearcher - The class performing Breadth-First search.
